Text: CHOIR SINGS SUNDAY MORNINGJust a quick reminder that all choirs sing this Sunday morning October We had a great time at the recording last Saturday and Ive missed you since then Im so proud of you all See you Sunday Love Dick PS We will pass around a signup this Sunday for your commitment to participate in the Christmas program The deadline to commit is Sunday November Make sure you have sandals for Act II Those of you who are new and have costumes will need to have your costume approved by Nancy LeBeau by October
